00015 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00016 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 #define BOOL_TO_BIT(X)       ((X) ? 1 : 0 )
00018 #define BIT_TO_BOOL(X)       ((X==1) ? SDL_TRUE : SDL_FALSE )
00019 
00020 #define HAS_SOME_BITS(XX,YY) (0 != ((XX)&(YY)))
00021 #define HAS_ALL_BITS(XX,YY)  ((YY) == ((XX)&(YY)))
00022 #define HAS_NO_BITS(XX,YY)   (0 == ((XX)&(YY)))
00023 #define MISSING_BITS(XX,YY)  (HAS_SOME_BITS(XX,YY) && !HAS_ALL_BITS(XX,YY))

00029 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 // SDL graphics info
00032     struct s_sdl_screen_info
00033     {
00034         // JF - Added so that the video mode might be determined outside of the graphics code
00035         SDL_Surface * pscreen;
00036 
00037         SDL_Rect **   video_mode_list;
00038 
00039         char          szDriver[256];    
00040 
00041         int    d;                  
00042         int    z;                  
00043         int    x;                  
00044         int    y;                  
00045 
00046         Uint8  alpha;              
00047 
00048         // SDL OpenGL attributes
00049         int red_d;  // SDL_GL_RED_SIZE Size of the framebuffer red component, in bits
00050         int grn_d;  // SDL_GL_GREEN_SIZE Size of the framebuffer green component, in bits
00051         int blu_d;  // SDL_GL_BLUE_SIZE Size of the framebuffer blue component, in bits
00052         int alp_d;  // SDL_GL_ALPHA_SIZE Size of the framebuffer alpha component, in bits
00053         int dbuff;  // SDL_GL_DOUBLEBUFFER 0 or 1, enable or disable double buffering
00054         int buf_d;  // SDL_GL_BUFFER_SIZE Size of the framebuffer, in bits
00055         int zbf_d;  // SDL_GL_DEPTH_SIZE Size of the depth buffer, in bits
00056         int stn_d;  // SDL_GL_STENCIL_SIZE Size of the stencil buffer, in bits
00057         int acr_d;  // SDL_GL_ACCUM_RED_SIZE Size of the accumulation buffer red component, in bits
00058         int acg_d;  // SDL_GL_ACCUM_GREEN_SIZE Size of the accumulation buffer green component, in bits
00059         int acb_d;  // SDL_GL_ACCUM_BLUE_SIZE Size of the accumulation buffer blue component, in bits
00060         int aca_d;  // SDL_GL_ACCUM_ALPHA_SIZE Size of the accumulation buffer alpha component, in bits
00061 
00062         // selected SDL bitfields
00063         unsigned hw_available: 1;
00064         unsigned wm_available: 1;
00065         unsigned blit_hw: 1;
00066         unsigned blit_hw_CC: 1;
00067         unsigned blit_hw_A: 1;
00068         unsigned blit_sw: 1;
00069         unsigned blit_sw_CC: 1;
00070         unsigned blit_sw_A: 1;
00071 
00072         unsigned is_sw: 1;          // SDL_SWSURFACE Surface is stored in system memory
00073         unsigned is_hw: 1;          // SDL_HWSURFACE Surface is stored in video memory
00074         unsigned use_asynch_blit: 1; // SDL_ASYNCBLIT Surface uses asynchronous blits if possible
00075         unsigned use_anyformat: 1;  // SDL_ANYFORMAT Allows any pixel-format (Display surface)
00076         unsigned use_hwpalette: 1;    // SDL_HWPALETTE Surface has exclusive palette
00077         unsigned is_doublebuf: 1;    // SDL_DOUBLEBUF Surface is double buffered (Display surface)
00078         unsigned is_fullscreen: 1;   // SDL_FULLSCREEN Surface is full screen (Display Surface)
00079         unsigned use_opengl: 1;       // SDL_OPENGL Surface has an OpenGL context (Display Surface)
00080         unsigned use_openglblit: 1;   // SDL_OPENGLBLIT Surface supports OpenGL blitting (Display Surface)
00081         unsigned sdl_resizable: 1;    // SDL_RESIZABLE Surface is resizable (Display Surface)
00082         unsigned use_hwaccel: 1;      // SDL_HWACCEL Surface blit uses hardware acceleration
00083         unsigned has_srccolorkey: 1;  // SDL_SRCCOLORKEY Surface use colorkey blitting
00084         unsigned use_rleaccel: 1;     // SDL_RLEACCEL Colorkey blitting is accelerated with RLE
00085         unsigned use_srcalpha: 1;     // SDL_SRCALPHA Surface blit uses alpha blending
00086 unsigned is_prealloc: 1;     // SDL_PREALLOC Surface uses preallocated memory
00087     };
00088     typedef struct s_sdl_screen_info sdl_screen_info_t;
00089
